<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
OENO: Are you ready, Cycad? Dusk falls on the surface of the planet. We shall be beginning our task soon!
2
1
CYCAD: Wait, Oeno! How will we travel outside this chamber? There are no entrances or exits out of this space!
3 2
OENO: Using the quantum shard, of course! By leaving your voyager standing on the quantum shard before disconnecting the voyager stone - doing so will leave the voyager little more than a scroll entangled with the shard.
4
3
OENO: When you reengage the voyager stone, your voyager should be delivered by the quantum shard to the surface of Timber Hearth!
5
3
CYCAD: But isn't our mission here to transport the native lifeforms into the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> to protect them during the operation of the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project?</color> How will we transport them into this space?
6
5
OENO: That is why this mission is set under the cover of night! We must simply move quietly and stealthily to transport them into the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> while they slumber.
7
6
OENO: Afterwards, we will watch over them within the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> so they do not slip back outside through the quantum shard.
8
7
OENO: Of note: if the quantum shard is at the surface, simply wait for nighttime within the <color=orange>Sanctuary.</color> The quantum shard should eventually visit the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> while you are unable to observe your surroundings!
